item.title: 10 things not to miss at this year's London Coffee Festival
item.description:
10 things not to miss at this year's London Coffee Festival

Almost daily we are boosted by the perfect micro-foamed flat white or zingy filter. Bad coffee just won't do any more, and in 2016 coffee is genuinely, admittedly cool.

item.title: The London Coffee Festival 2016 (07 - 10 April)
item.description:
The London Coffee Festival 2016 (07 - 10 April)

The London Coffee Festival celebrates London's bustling and vibrant coffee scene. This year, 23,642 discerning coffee lovers and industry professionals attended the event from 30 April to 03 May 2015.

item.title: London Coffee Festival
item.description:
London Coffee Festival

Returning for 2016, the London Coffee Festival is the UK's largest coffee and artisan food event, a celebration of London's vibrant coffee culture featuring gourmet coffee, speciality tea, artisan food, demonstrations from world-class baristas, live music and a comprehensive 'lab' seminar programme that will educate even the keenest of coffee lovers.
